Text1 Translation: Sir Rex Harrison (5 March 1908 2 June 1990) was a British stage and film actor.
Text2: Harrison is op 2 Junie 1990 in sy huis in Manhattan dood op die ouderdom van 82.
Text2 Translation: Harrison died on June 2, 1990 at his home in Manhattan at the age of 82.

Text1: Iemand wat op dieselfde perseel woon, kan n beëdigde verklaring aflê dat jy ook daar woon.
Text1 Translation: Someone who lives on the same premises can make an affidavit that you also live there.
Text2: Hy/sy moet n afskrif van hul ID en bewys van woonadres insluit; dieselfde adres waar jy woon.
Text2 Translation: He/she must include a copy of their ID and proof of residential address; the same address where you live.

Text1: Op 'n eerste vlak gaan dit oor die algemene verhale wat in die gemeenskap gedeel word.
Text1 Translation: On a first level, it is about the common stories that are shared in the community.
Text2: Op 'n volgende vlak word verhale net binne 'n ruimte van vertroue gedeel.
Text2 Translation: On a next level, stories are only shared within a space of trust.

Text1: Die meeste soorte melk het 45 - 60 kalorieë en 4.7 - 5.0 gram koolhidrate per 100 ml.
Text1 Translation: Most types of milk have 45 - 60 calories and 4.7 - 5.0 grams of carbohydrates per 100 ml.
Text2: Doen dit vier keer 'n week en jy sal 1200 bykomende kalorieë en 100 gram koolhidrate kry.
Text2 Translation: Do this four times a week and you will gain 1200 additional calories and 100 grams of carbohydrates.

Text1: Daar is 'n aantal natuurlike suur reflux produkte vir die behandeling wat eaily sorg van hierdie probleem.
Text1 Translation: There are a number of natural acid reflux treatment products that eaily take care of this problem.
Text2: Hy kan ook beveel 'n natuurlike suur reflux behandeling.
Text2 Translation: He may also recommend a natural acid reflux treatment.

Text1: Daardie één geweer wat net so n bietjie meer spesiaal is as die ander in die kluis.
Text1 Translation: That one gun that is just that little bit more special than the others in the safe.
Text2: Soms kliek jy en n geweer net, ongeag die kaliber.
Text2 Translation: Sometimes you and a gun just click, regardless of caliber.

Text1: Nelson Mandela was maar net n mens soos elkeen van ons.
Text1 Translation: Nelson Mandela was just a human being like each of us.
Text2: Nelson Mandela was n gewone mens nes elkeen van ons.
Text2 Translation: Nelson Mandela was an ordinary person like each of us.

Text1: Skaap sleep vyf swaar stompe oor die sloot.
Text1 Translation: Sheep drags five heavy logs across the ditch.
Text2: Skaap sleep die bruin dwarshoute oor die swaar stompe.
Text2 Translation: Sheep drags the brown timbers over the heavy logs.

Text1: Daar word n vlot gebou van 12,5m lank en 2.1 m breed.
Text1 Translation: A raft is being built 12.5m long and 2.1m wide.
Text2: Almal se bagasie en die kos vir n week word op hierdie vlot gelaai.
Text2 Translation: Everyone's luggage and the food for a week are loaded onto this raft.

Text1: Hou jou asem op terwyl iemand anders (nie jy self nie) vir jou tot tien tel.
Text1 Translation: Hold your breath while someone else (not you) counts to ten for you.
Text2: Blaas uit en laat die ander persoon weer vir jou tot tien tel voordat jy weer asem skep.
Text2 Translation: Exhale and have the other person count to ten for you again before taking another breath.

Text1: Ek sien ook daars n Suid-Afrikaanse Esperanto vereniging, so sterkte aan hulle.
Text1 Translation: I also see a South African Esperanto association there, so good luck to them.
Text2: Dalk word die grond nie verkoop nie, maar neem die kind(ers) net die boerdery oor.
Text2 Translation: Perhaps the land is not sold, but the child(ren) just take over the farming.

Text1: Unicode is 'n internasionale standaard vir die identifikasie van grafiese tekens en simbole (soortgelyk aan die ASCII-kode).
Text1 Translation: Unicode is an international standard for the identification of graphic signs and symbols (similar to the ASCII code).
Text2: Die standaard ken 'n nommer aan alle tekens en simbole ('karakters') van alle geskrewe tale toe.
Text2 Translation: The standard assigns a number to all signs and symbols ('characters') of all written languages.

Text1: Die naaswenner kry vyf nagte se bed-en-ontbyt-verblyf vir twee in die Grand Gaube-oord.
Text1 Translation: The runner-up gets five nights' bed and breakfast accommodation for two in the Grand Gaube Resort.
Text2: Die bruid in die derde plek ontvang bed-en-ontbyt-verblyf vir vyf nagte vir twee in die Le Morne-oord.
Text2 Translation: The bride in third place receives five nights' bed and breakfast accommodation for two at Le Morne Resort.

Text1: Met Ultra Dog Superwoof Adult Beef and Rice sal jy nie Cheeky se dieet hoef aan te vul nie.
Text1 Translation: With Ultra Dog Superwoof Adult Beef and Rice you won't need to supplement Cheeky's diet.
Text2: Vertrou op Ultra Dog Superwoof vir n volledige en gebalanseerde dieet vir volwasse honde.
Text2 Translation: Rely on Ultra Dog Superwoof for a complete and balanced diet for adult dogs.

Text1: Noordbaai (Coral Island) bied eksotiese koraal, kleurvolle visse en onderwater mariene lewe.
Text1 Translation: North Bay (Coral Island) offers exotic coral, colorful fish and underwater marine life.
Text2: Ons kan hierdie kleurvolle koraal en onderwater seelewe deur middel van 'n glasbodem en snorkel (opsioneel) besigtig.
Text2 Translation: We can view this colorful coral and underwater marine life through a glass bottom and snorkel (optional).
